type.name: T:Elysium.Converters.DoubleToGridLengthConverter
type.summary: Converts a value of the type into the type .

method.name: M:Elysium.Converters.DoubleToGridLengthConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
method.summary: Converts a value of the type into the type .
method.param: A target type. The value is ignored.
Converter's parameter. Has to be a string and can be one of the next values: "Auto", "*" or null.
Language and local parameters used in converter. The value is ignored.
method.returns:
A value of the type . The results depends on the value of the following paremeter :
"Auto": GridLength.Auto. A value of the parameter is ignored.
"*": A value is represented as a calculated part of the available space. A value of the part weight has to be set in the parameter .
null: A value, measured in pixels, is returned A quantity of pixels has to be set in the parameter .

method.name: M:Elysium.Converters.DoubleToGridLengthConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
method.summary: Converts a value of the type into the type .
method.param: A target type. The value is ignored.
Converter's parameter. Has to be a string and can be one of the next values: "Auto", "*" or null.
Language and local parameters used in converter. The value is ignored.
method.returns: A value of the type . Result is a value of the type or DependencyProperty.UnsetValue, in case types dont match ("Auto", "*" or pixels amount) Ð¸ or failure during method execution.
